DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy early intervention ( dose within 2 hour onset migraine attack ) eletriptan 40mg mild versus moderate severe pain intensity migraine .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Study Effects Eletriptan 40mg Mild v Moderate Severe Pain Intensity Migraine
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis migraine without aura accord recent IHS criterion . Migraine headaches must present one year . History last 3 month 1 4 acute attack migraine headache per month . Subjects current past history coronary artery disease . Pregnant breastfeed woman . Subjects chronic daily headache .
